messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: Sometimes, when a bridge falls down, it is a mystery, and engineers only understand why after they do a complete study. This can happen because bad quality materials were used when the bridge was built, or because there was a problem with an important part of the bridge. However, in other situations, the bridge was only designed to hold a certain amount of weight, and it could not hold more.
